clip.quote: One really great thing to do is to build that about me video... What makes you different than the people around the corner?
clip.why_clipworthy: It provides a clear, actionable strategy for agents to differentiate themselves.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to stand out in real estate? Here's how an 'About Me' video can set you apart.
